summary: Makes Smithing Tree more flexible to support different playstyles (such as option to choose adv armors instead of orcish)
descriptionHtml:
Never liked how boring the light armor tree was in regards to weapons, jumping from glass straight to dragon ?
Or it your warrior on the heavy armor tree, why that lovely platemail doing on the light armor side anyway ?
Then this mod is for you.

[b]Changes[/b]
This mod aim is to enrich playstyle without introducing perks, changes, or imbalances.
• Orcish Armor / Platemail have almost the same stats, so they are now interchangable.
• Ebony is now accessible after adv armors, useful for thieves.
• Light Side is no longer a shortcut to dragon, it now takes the same amount of perks to dragon regardless of path.

[b]Installation[/b]
Recommended to use Nexus Mod Manager.
Requires Dawnguard DLC, and obviously Incompatible with mods that change smithing perks.
If using Slower Leveling Mod, use special version instead (should be below in loading order)

[b]Related Mods[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24201]Dwarven Gear Enhanced[/url] - for those who don\'t like the dull look, brings out those details.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24422]Slower Skill Leveling with Fixes[/url] - with optional fixes such as enchanting advancing as fast as smithing.
author: svartberg
